post_text: “Can you hear me now?”“Oops, I was on mute.”Communication breakdowns can happen anywhere — even in the best teams.With people from diverse cultures, backgrounds, and beliefs working together, miscommunication is bound to occur.Here’s how to handle it better:1️⃣ Try a Different ApproachFind out what caused the breakdown — was it your tone, tool, or message? Try a different way to get your point across.2️⃣ Focus on Solutions, Not BlameDon’t panic or point fingers. Step back, reflect, and work towards a practical fix — maybe it’s adjusting timelines or simply communicating more clearly.3️⃣ Ask, Don’t AssumeAssumptions can lead to chaos. Ask questions, clarify, and confirm.4️⃣ Listen and Be AwareStrong listening skills and cultural awareness go a long way in avoiding misunderstandings.Have you ever faced a communication breakdown at work? How did you handle it?Share your story in the commentsVideo credits to the ownerI am Aarti Ahuja helping senior leaders withhashtag#personalbrandingandhashtag#leadershipDevelopmenthashtag#communicationbreakdown…more

The Power of Knowledge vs. Experience 💡🤝In the world of personal and professional growth, the debate between knowledge and experience has been ongoing. 🤔 Let's dive into this intriguing conversation and explore the unique strengths of each:💡 Knowledge is the foundation upon which we build our understanding. It's the accumulation of information, theories, and expertise that helps us navigate our careers and lives. A strong educational background or continuous learning can set the stage for success. However, knowledge alone might lack practical application.🤝 Experience, on the other hand, is the real-world laboratory where we test and refine our knowledge. It's the crucible of learning, where we encounter challenges, make mistakes, and adapt. Practical experience is invaluable because it bridges the gap between theory and application, turning knowledge into wisdom.Here's the twist: it's not knowledge OR experience, but knowledge AND experience that create the most powerful synergy. 🚀The best professionals combine their knowledge with practical experience. They seek to balance the theoretical with the hands-on, using their education as a compass and their experience as a map. 🗺️So, what does this mean for you?1️⃣ Continuously invest in learning. Update your knowledge, acquire new skills, and stay ahead in your field.2️⃣ Embrace challenges and opportunities for real-world experience. Don't fear mistakes; see them as stepping stones to growth.3️⃣ Reflect on your experiences to extract lessons that reinforce your knowledge.In a world of rapid change, adaptability, and innovation, the balance of knowledge and experience is your secret sauce. 💪Share your thoughts! How do you strike the balance between knowledge and experience in your professional journey? Let's inspire and learn from each other.🚀hashtag#KnowledgeVsExperiencehashtag#ProfessionalGrowthhashtag#LearningJourney…more

𝐃𝐨𝐧’𝐭 𝐅𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐬 𝐨𝐧 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦𝐬, 𝐅𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐬 𝐨𝐧 𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬. In both our personal and professional lives, it’s easy to get bogged down by challenges and obstacles.,➡️➡️However, shifting our mindset from problemoriented thinking to solution-focused thinking can transform how we tackle issues and achieve our goals.🆗🆗Here’s how you can make this shift:✓ 𝐈𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐲 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐑𝐨𝐨𝐭 𝐂𝐚𝐮𝐬𝐞:▶️▶️Instead of dwelling on the problem, dig deeper to understand its root cause. This helps in addressing the issue at its core and finding lasting solutions.✓ 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞:⏬⏬Maintain a positive attitude, even when faced with challenges. Approach each problem with a proactive mindset, ready to brainstorm and implement solutions.✓ 𝐁𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬:☑️☑️Gather your team or peers to brainstorm potential solutions. Encourage creative thinking and consider multiple perspectives to find the best approach.✓ 𝐓𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐀𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:▶️▶️Once you’ve identified a solution, take immediate action. Implementing your plan swiftly can prevent problems from escalating and help you gain control over the situation.✓ 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐀𝐝𝐚𝐩𝐭:🆗🆗View each problem as a learning opportunity. Reflect on the solutions you implemented, what worked, and what didn’t, so you can adapt and improve for future challenges.✓ 𝐂𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐦𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐬:☑️☑️☑️Acknowledge and celebrate each step forward, no matter how small. This reinforces a positive, solution-focused mindset and motivates you to keep going.Remember, focusing on solutions empowers you to take control and drive positive outcomes. Let’s shift our perspective and embrace a proactive approach to problem-solving.Follow - Michael Sipe Growing businesses using proven strategies & systems | Helped over 100+ businesses scale operations and revenue.Disclaimer- The attached video belongs to his/her respective owner only. AI-driven Agriculture Could AI end world hunger?Let's dive into the transformative potential of AI in agriculture - a field that could redefine how we tackle global hunger.AI technology is revolutionizing the agricultural sector by enhancing productivity and sustainability. Imagine farms where decisions are data-driven, optimizing every step from planting to harvest. AI tools can analyze soil conditions, predict weather patterns, and manage pests with unprecedented accuracy. This precision farming not only boosts yields but also conserves resources, making food production more efficient and sustainable.A major AI-driven advancement is the use of drones and satellite imagery. These technologies provide real-time data on crop health, allowing farmers to take timely action. They can identify areas needing attention, ensuring that resources like water and fertilizers are used judiciously. This targeted approach reduces waste and enhances crop quality.AI also plays a crucial role in supply chain optimization. Through predictive analytics, AI can forecast demand and manage logistics, ensuring that food reaches markets promptly. This efficiency reduces spoilage and lowers costs, making food more affordable and accessible.Moreover, AI-powered vertical farming is gaining traction. By controlling environmental factors within indoor systems, vertical farms can produce food all year round, irrespective of climate conditions. This innovation not only increases food supply but also reduces dependency on traditional farming, which is vulnerable to climate change.While AI holds great promise, collaboration between tech developers, farmers, and policymakers is vital to ensure these technologies are accessible and beneficial to all, especially smallholders in developing regions. By embracing AI, we can create a more resilient agricultural system, potentially taking significant strides towards ending world hunger.P.S. How do you see AI changing the landscape of agriculture in the next decade?Want to learn how to implement Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions for your business operations? 🌟 Every problem has a solution! 🌟Life is full of challenges, but remember… nothing is impossible! 💪🌱 Whether you're facing a tough project at work, a personal hurdle, or a setback in your career, there is ALWAYS a way forward.🔑💡 Stay focused, stay positive, and keep pushing forward!🚀 No matter how big the problem seems, there is a solution waiting for you. 🧠✨👉 Break it down into small steps.👉 Stay calm and think clearly.👉 Surround yourself with positive energy and people. 🙌The key is never to give up, no matter how hard it gets. Keep believing in yourself, keep learning, and keep growing. 🌱💥Your breakthrough is closer than you think! Keep going, keep striving, and know that with the right mindset, ANY challenge can be overcome! 🔥followDreamJobs Dailyhashtag#KeepGoinghashtag#NeverGiveUphashtag#SolutionFocusedhashtag#Motivationhashtag#Mindsethashtag#SuccessMindsethashtag#StayPositivehashtag#BelieveInYourselfhashtag#forwardKeyhashtag#Dreamjobsdaily…more

📝A scattered mind leads to scattered results. Focus is the secret ingredient to success.Attention ➡️ Intention ➡️ Execution📖There was once a young entrepreneur, Isha, who had a brilliant idea for an eco-friendly fashion brand.She was passionate and creative, but she struggled with distractions constantly jumping between ideas without real execution."Ideas are good, but execution is everything."Months passed, and her business barely moved forward.One day, a mentor told her, Isha, your ideas are like scattered sunlight; warm but unfocused. If you bring them together like a magnifying glass 🔎, you’ll create fire."🔥Taking this advice to heart, she cut out distractions, prioritised her most impactful goals, and worked with intention.She refined her vision, developed a strong marketing strategy, and focused on execution.Within a year, her brand gained recognition, and she realized that success wasn’t about doing everything it was about doing the right things with focus and self-awareness.Here are some key takeaways from this post:➡️ Self-awareness is of utmost importance for career success and is a holistic life skill.➡️ It enables individuals to identify and capitalize on their strengths, address their weaknesses, make informed decisions, enhance interpersonal skills, foster continuous learning, and build resilience.➡️ When you're focused, all aspects of your thinking improve, including perception, memory, learning, and reasoning. This clarity allows you to see things more clearly and make better choices for your business and life.➡️ Without focus, it's easy to become overwhelmed and make poor decisions that can lead to negative results.💟 Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. As they say, the sun’s rays do not burn 🔥 until brought to a focus.The bottom line is: Clarity comes from focus. Success comes from execution.What are you focusing on today?Write-up: ShahnawazVideo credit: motivationaltailss83hashtag#selfawarenesshashtag#focushashtag#outcomeshashtag#goals…more

𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐟 𝐇𝐢𝐝𝐝𝐞𝐧 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐥.We live in a world where first impressions often shape our judgments. But, when it comes to true talent and potential, things are not always what they seem at first glance.Here’s why it’s crucial to look beyond the surface and recognize the hidden potential in people.👉 𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐡𝐚𝐬 𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐞𝐝 𝐩𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐥: Whether it’s a quiet team member or someone new to a role, there is often more to people than what meets the eye. Sometimes, all it takes is the right opportunity or environment to bring out their best.👉 𝐆𝐫𝐨𝐰𝐭𝐡 𝐭𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐬 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞: Just like a seed grows into a tree, personal and professional growth is a process. Some individuals may need time, mentorship, or new challenges to unlock their true capabilities.👉 𝐋𝐨𝐨𝐤 𝐛𝐞𝐲𝐨𝐧𝐝 𝐟𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬: The loudest person in the room isn’t always the most capable, and the most confident speaker isn’t always the most knowledgeable. Sometimes, the quietest individuals have the greatest potential waiting to be tapped.👉 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫: Providing the right resources, training, and support can help individuals grow and reach their hidden potential. It’s not about what someone starts with; it’s about how you help them develop over time.👉 𝐃𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐢𝐧 𝐬𝐤𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐬𝐞𝐭𝐬: People bring a variety of strengths to the table, and sometimes these strengths may not align with traditional roles or expectations. When we create a space for people to showcase their hidden talents, the results can be remarkable.👉 𝐏𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐢𝐬 𝐤𝐞𝐲: Don’t rush to judge someone based on what you see in the first few weeks, months, or even years. Patience allows people to develop their skills and show you what they’re truly capable of.Remember, it’s often the quiet ones, the overlooked, and those who don’t fit the conventional mold who surprise us the most. When we invest time, energy, and resources into discovering and nurturing hidden potential, we unlock greatness – not only for individuals but for entire teams and organizations.hashtag#growthmindsethashtag#leadershiphashtag#hiddenpotentialhashtag#innovationhashtag#successhashtag#teamworkhashtag#empowermenthashtag#motivationFollowHasnain AhmedVC:- Social media…more

One Mistake Can Destroy a Lifetime of Hard Work! 🚨💔Success is built on years of dedication, late nights, and relentless effort. But sometimes, one wrong decision can unravel it all in seconds.🔹 Warren Buffett once said:❝It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.❞🔹 Steve Jobs warned us:❝Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly and get on with improving your other innovations.❞Mistakes are inevitable, but learning from them and adapting fast is what separates the winners from the quitters. Don't let one failure define you—let it refine you! 💡🔥 Key Takeaways:✅ Think before you act—small missteps can have big consequences.✅ Own your mistakes, learn from them, and move forward stronger.✅ Your reputation and hard work are priceless—protect them!💬 Have you ever faced a tough situation due to a single mistake? How did you bounce back? Drop your thoughts in the comments! 👇hashtag#SuccessMindsethashtag#WorkHardStayHumblehashtag#LessonsLearnedhashtag#GrowthMindsethashtag#BusinessWisdomhashtag#WesternBusinesshashtag#CareerSuccesshashtag#SelfImprovementhashtag#Leadershiphashtag#Londonhashtag#USAhashtag#UKhashtag#Canadahashtag#DigitalMarkeing…more

🚀 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐞 & 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦: 𝐅𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐤𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐬, 𝐈𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 & 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐲—𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐛𝐲 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐀𝐫𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐅𝐥𝐨𝐰🎥 𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭:What if leadership, innovation, and digital transformation were like marbling art?In this video, a Turkish artist performs the ancient technique of marbling—floating pigments on water and skillfully guiding them into vibrant, organic patterns. It’s precise, fluid, and intentional—just like the future of business.🔥 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐲: 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐈 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐋𝐞𝐭 𝐆𝐨 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐅𝐥𝐨𝐰Early in my career, I was obsessed with control—trying to force results, micromanage processes, and push everything forward with sheer effort.But real growth came when I learned to shift my mindset.💡 𝟏. 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐢𝐬 𝐋𝐢𝐤𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐛𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠: 𝐒𝐮𝐛𝐭𝐥𝐞, 𝐒𝐤𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐟𝐮𝐥, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥Just as the artist manipulates the flow of color on water, digital leaders must navigate a sea of tools—AI, automation, platforms, and data—with strategic precision.This is the art of digital transformation: knowing when to act, when to adapt, and when to let innovation flow naturally.🎯 𝟐. 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐲 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐁𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡: 𝐆𝐮𝐢𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐏𝐮𝐫𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐞In marbling, there’s no randomness. Every swirl has a reason.Great business strategy works the same way—it’s not about reacting to change but shaping it. Visionary businesses frame challenges as design opportunities, channeling resources to form patterns of lasting impact.🏆 𝟑. 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐇𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐁𝐞𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐀𝐫𝐭Marbling isn’t just technical—it’s intuitive.Like the artist who gently directs pigments into harmony, a modern leader nurtures culture, empowers teams, and sees potential in ambiguity. It’s about clarity, calm, and co-creation—not control.💬 𝐋𝐞𝐭’𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐟𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐭This ancient art isn’t just mesmerizing—it’s a metaphor for modern leadership and innovation.👉 Where do you need more flow and less force in your strategy?👉 What patterns are you designing with your digital skills?𝐋𝐞𝐭’𝐬 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐚 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 👇✨ 𝐋𝐞𝐭’𝐬 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭 & 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐓𝐨𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫If you believe in the power of AI, digital mastery, business innovation, and visionary leadership, let’s build something great together. 🌍🔗hashtag#digitaltransformationhashtag#leadershiphashtag#businessstrategyhashtag#creativityhashtag#innovationhashtag#futureofwork…more

AI is transforming classroom safety with predictive algorithms. Let's explore how these technologies are creating a safer environment for students.Traditional safety measures often rely on reactive approaches. However, AI offers a proactive solution. By analyzing vast amounts of data, predictive algorithms can identify potential threats before they occur. Here's how:1. **Data Analysis**: AI systems analyze patterns from various data sources, including social media, attendance records, and behavioral cues. This data is used to identify signs of potential safety risks, such as bullying or unauthorized access.2. **Real-time Monitoring**: AI-powered surveillance systems can monitor live feeds from cameras in schools. These systems are capable of recognizing unusual activities or suspicious behavior, alerting authorities instantly.3. **Behavioral Prediction**: By understanding behavioral patterns, AI can predict when a student might be at risk of harm or pose a threat to others. This allows educators to intervene early and provide necessary support or resources.4. **Access Control**: AI enhances security protocols by managing access to school premises. Facial recognition and other biometric systems ensure that only authorized individuals can enter, reducing the risk of intrusions.5. **Resource Allocation**: Predictive algorithms help allocate resources efficiently in emergency situations. By simulating different scenarios, AI can suggest optimal evacuation routes and emergency response strategies.The implementation of AI in classroom safety isn't just about technology; it's about fostering a secure learning environment where students can thrive without fear. As these systems continue to evolve, they will offer even greater precision and reliability in safeguarding our schools.For businesses and educational institutions, embracing AI-driven safety measures means investing in the future of learning. It's about being prepared and proactive, ensuring that every student has the opportunity to learn in a secure setting.P.S. How do you think AI can further improve safety in educational environments?Want to learn how Artificial Intelligence (AI) can improve your business operations? Get in touch🔄 Repost this post…more

🚀 SpaceX Makes History with Starship’s Successful Launch and Landing! 🌍✨In a groundbreaking achievement, SpaceX has successfully launched and landed Starship, the most powerful rocket ever built! This monumental step brings humanity closer to deep space exploration, with the ultimate goal of reaching the Moon, Mars, and beyond.🔹 Key Highlights:✅ Booster Recovery – SpaceX used its innovative “chopstick” mechanical arms to catch the booster on the launchpad, a major step toward full reusability.✅ Record-Breaking Power – Starship stands as the most powerful spacecraft ever made, designed to transport humans across the solar system.✅ The Future of Space Travel – Elon Musk and SpaceX are paving the way for interplanetary missions, making dreams of colonizing Mars closer to reality.This isn’t just a win for SpaceX—it’s a win for the future of human space exploration! 🌌 What are your thoughts on this historic moment? Drop them below! 👇Follow meFazzilet®Video Credit: All rights belong to the respective owner. THE TECHNOLOGY BEHIND CONCRETE BLANKETS.1. Flexible Concrete Sheets: A fabric-like material impregnated with cement that hardens when hydrated.2. Rapid Deployment: Can be unrolled and set in place within minutes.3. Self-Contained Water Activation: Some versions contain built-in water reservoirs for easy curing.4. Lightweight Yet Strong: Easier to transport than traditional concrete slabs.5. Erosion Control: Used for stabilizing slopes, riverbanks, and embankments.6. Fire Resistant: Provides protection against extreme heat and flames.7. Puncture and Tear Resistant: Reinforced layers enhance durability in rough environments.8. Waterproof Properties: Resists water penetration after hardening.9. Easy Installation: Requires minimal labor and no specialized machinery.10. High Compressive Strength: Can withstand significant loads and impacts.11. Customizable Thickness: Available in different thicknesses for varied applications.12. Eco-Friendly Solution: Reduces material waste compared to poured concrete.13. Emergency Repair Use: Ideal for quick road and infrastructure repairs.14. Military Applications: Used for rapid fortifications and bunkers.15. Reduces Construction Time: Cures faster than conventional concrete.16. Moldable Before Setting: Can conform to irregular surfaces before hardening.17. Long Lifespan: Highly durable under extreme conditions.18. Non-Toxic Composition: Safe for use in water channels and ecological areas.19. Cost-Effective Alternative: Reduces transportation and labor costs.20. Future Advancements: Research is enhancing flexibility and strength further.…more

Why is Safety PPE Important?Did you know that over 24% of workplace injuries could be prevented by proper use of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)? Yet, many workers still neglect wearing it!What is PPE?PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) includes helmets, gloves, safety glasses, respirators, and protective clothing designed to protect workers from hazards like chemicals, falling objects, and extreme temperatures.Why is PPE Crucial?✅ Prevents Injuries & Fatalities – Protects against head injuries, burns, and cuts.✅ Reduces Exposure to Toxic Substances – Shields from chemicals, dust, and fumes.✅ Ensures Compliance – Adhering to safety regulations avoids legal penalties.✅ Boosts Productivity – Fewer injuries mean less downtime and higher efficiency.How to Improve PPE Compliance?✔ Training & Awareness – Educate workers on the importance of PPE.✔ Comfort & Fit – Choose PPE that is comfortable to wear.✔ Regular Inspections – Ensure PPE is in good condition and replaced when necessary.🚨 Remember: Safety starts with YOU! Never skip PPE—it could save your life.📢 What’s your biggest challenge in PPE compliance? 🚀 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗜𝘀𝗻’𝘁 𝗝𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗮 𝗩𝗶𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗲—𝗜𝘁’𝘀 𝗦𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲. 𝗛𝗲𝗿𝗲’𝘀 𝗪𝗵𝘆.Ever wanted to quit? 😤 So did NASA. They failed 𝟱 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲𝘀 before landing the Perseverance rover on Mars. But guess what? Today, it’s sending us breathtaking photos of alien sunsets. 🌌 Moral? 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝘄𝗮𝗿𝗱𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝘄𝗵𝗼 𝗿𝗲𝗳𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗴𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘂𝗽.Let’s get real:🧠 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝘁 > 𝗧𝗮𝗹𝗲𝗻𝘁. A study by UPenn found that people with perseverance (not just smarts) are 60% more likely to crush their long-term goals.💼 𝟴𝟲% 𝗼𝗳 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗱𝗲𝗿𝘀 say resilience is THE top skill for success… yet 72% of us almost quit when things get tough (Edelman, 2023).𝗛𝗲𝗿𝗲’𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗲𝗮 ☕:Life’s like a video game 🎮—you beat one boss, another appears. But quitting? That’s like unplugging the controller right before the final level. 🛑𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿:✨ Thomas Edison “failed” 1,000 times before inventing the lightbulb. His take? “I didn’t fail. I discovered 1,000 ways that don’t work.”✨ 𝟴𝟬% 𝗼𝗳 “𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗻𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝘀𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀” took 8+ years of grinding in the shadows (Stanford). Your moment might be one step away.𝗦𝗼… 𝗳𝗲𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝘁𝘂𝗰𝗸?Ask yourself:❓ “What if I’m closer than I think?”❓ “Will quitting SOLVE my problem… or just delay it?”❓ “What’s ONE tiny win I can chase today?” (Example: Send that email. Make that call. Fix one slide. 🎯)𝗕𝗼𝘁𝘁𝗼𝗺 𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲:Life doesn’t hand out trophies for “almost.” 🏆 It’s not about avoiding storms—it’s about learning to dance in the rain, then building a boat, and maybe inventing waterproof shoes along the way. ⛈️⛵👟𝗧𝗮𝗴 𝘀𝗼𝗺𝗲𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝘄𝗵𝗼 𝗡𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥 𝗾𝘂𝗶𝘁𝘀 👇Let’s cheer for the fighters, the scrappy dreamers, and the ones who turn “I can’t” into “Watch me.” 🙌FollowGaurav Tomar 🇮🇳for more.hashtag#ResilienceMattershashtag#SuccessIsAParadeNotASprinthashtag#KeepGoinghashtag#NoExcuseshashtag#YouGotThis…more

Is This A Right Way To Do A Job...???Why Risk Assessment is important"As you can see, the workers are demolishing a wall without any safety precautions or risk assessment. This is a recipe for disaster. Risk assessment is a crucial step in identifying potential hazards and taking steps to mitigate them.*Importance of Risk Assessment:*"Risk assessment is essential for several reasons:1. *Identifies potential hazards*: Risk assessment helps identify potential hazards that could lead to injuries, illnesses, or even fatalities.2. *Prevents accidents*: By identifying potential hazards, risk assessment helps prevent accidents from occurring in the first place.3. *Reduces liability*: Conducting a risk assessment demonstrates a commitment to safety and can help reduce liability in the event of an accident.4. *Improves safety culture*: Risk assessment promotes a safety-first culture, encouraging workers to think critically about potential hazards and take steps to mitigate them."*Consequences of Not Assessing Risk:*"So, what happens when risk assessment is ignored? The consequences can be severe:1. *Injuries and fatalities*: Ignoring risk assessment can lead to serious injuries or even fatalities.2. *Damage to equipment and property*: Unidentified hazards can cause damage to equipment and property, leading to costly repairs or replacement.3. *Lost productivity*: Accidents and injuries can lead to lost productivity, impacting project timelines and profitability.4. *Reputational damage*: A lack of commitment to safety can damage a company's reputation, impacting future business opportunities."*Conclusion:*"In conclusion, risk assessment is a critical step in ensuring a safe working environment. By identifying potential hazards and taking steps to mitigate them, we can prevent accidents, reduce liability, and improve safety culture. Remember, safety is everyone's responsibility.Let's make it a priority."hashtag#HSEhashtag#HealthAndSafetyhashtag#WorkplaceSafetyhashtag#RiskAssessmenthashtag#SafetyFirsthashtag#EnvironmentalSafetyhashtag#OccupationalHealthhashtag#SafetyManagementhashtag#HazardIdentificationhashtag#SafetyTraininghashtag#ConstructionSafetyhashtag#DemolitionSafetyhashtag#SafetyCulturehashtag#ZeroHarmhashtag#SafetyLeadershiphashtag#WorkplaceAccidentshashtag#InjuryPreventionhashtag#SafetyAwarenesshashtag#HSETraininghashtag#SafetyBestPractices…more

An unsafe working environment poses significant risks to the physical and mental health of employees.This can include inadequate facilities, poor ventilation, and insufficient personal protective equipment, making workers vulnerable to injuries, illnesses, and even fatalities.Hazards such as slippery floors, exposed wiring, and heavy machinery can lead to accidents, while inadequate staffing, long working hours, and high workload can contribute to stress and burnout.Furthermore, workplaces with inadequate security measures, bullying, or harassment can also compromise employees' safety and well-being. Employers have a legal and moral responsibility to provide a safe working environment, identify and mitigate hazards, and ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.Employees also have the right to report concerns and refuse to work in situations that pose a risk to their health and safety.hashtag#healthandsafety…more

Tray-Grown Seedlings: Ensures uniform root development before transplanting.3. Two-Wheeler as Transport: Saves time and labor in fieldwork.4. Reduces Seedling Damage: Gentle uprooting prevents root shock.5. Portable and Flexible System: Works in various terrains and farm sizes.6. Minimizes Soil Disruption: Keeps roots intact for better growth.7. Eco-Friendly Alternative: Reduces reliance on fuel-powered machinery.8. Speeds Up Plantation Process: Transplants large quantities quickly.9. Reduces Manual Labor Costs: Fewer workers needed for transplanting.10. DIY Approach Saves Money: No need for expensive machinery.11. Works for Multiple Crops: Suitable for vegetables, rice, and saplings.12. Encourages Precision Planting: Ensures proper spacing and alignment.13. Customizable Setup: Can be modified for different tray sizes.14. Protects Seedlings from Pests: Less handling reduces damage risks.15. Reduces Back Strain for Farmers: Less bending and lifting required.16. Minimal Training Needed: Easy to learn and implement.17. Weather-Resistant Solution: Works in both wet and dry conditions.18. Sustainable Farming Practice: Reduces waste and improves efficiency.19. Prevents Root Drying: Transplants quickly to maintain moisture.20. Boosts Crop Yield: Healthier seedlings lead to stronger plants.…more

With the right mentorship and encouragement, they learn to adapt, fall, and rise stronger. Leaders play a vital role by offering support while fostering independence.𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗮𝘁𝗵𝘆 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗣𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲:Much like a mother bear nurturing her cub, leaders and mentors need to guide without micromanaging. Empathy and patience create an environment where growth flourishes and innovation thrives.Here’s what we can learn from this:1️⃣ For Mentors and Leaders: Allow juniors to learn through trial and error. Mistakes are the foundation of confidence and growth.2️⃣ For Freshers: Rejections and failures are not the end. Stay persistent, and every setback will lead you closer to your goal.3️⃣ For Everyone: Build an environment of trust and care. Empathy is a powerful force that helps others grow without fear of failure.Every stumble is a step toward success.So, be courageous, stay focused, and support those around you. Together, we can create a world where no one is afraid to try, fail, or rise.Which of these lessons resonates with your journey? Let’s reflect and grow together.…more

𝐖𝐡𝐞𝐧 𝐚 𝐃𝐞𝐦𝐨 𝐆𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐖𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐠!Getting demo-ready for a product sale means ensuring your presentation is smooth, engaging, and compelling.𝐔𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐀𝐮𝐝𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞:Research the prospect’s industry, pain points, and needs.Customize your demo to align with their specific challenges.𝐃𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐞 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐎𝐛𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐬:What do you want them to take away from the demo?Focus on 2-3 key value propositions that resonate with them.𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐭 & 𝐅𝐥𝐨𝐰:Start with a strong hook (problem statement).Demonstrate the solution (your product’s key features).Showcase the impact (how it benefits them).End with a call to action (next steps).𝐖𝐡𝐞𝐧 𝐚 𝐃𝐞𝐦𝐨 𝐆𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐖𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐠:A failed demo can shake audience confidence, but how you handle it makes all the difference. Instead of trying to cover up the issue, the best approach is transparency, adaptability, and confidence. In this scene we can clearly see the small change in environment gave difficulty to prove the real power of the knife.𝐀𝐜𝐤𝐧𝐨𝐰𝐥𝐞𝐝𝐠𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐈𝐬𝐬𝐮𝐞 𝐇𝐨𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐥𝐲:Don’t try to bluff -audiences can tell!Say something like: "Looks like the knife isn’t performing as expected. That’s not what we usually see, so let me figure out why."𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐀𝐮𝐝𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦-𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠:Ask: "Has anyone experienced this with a knife before? What do you usually do?"This turns the moment into a discussion rather than a failure.𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐬 & 𝐃𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐚 𝐅𝐢𝐱:"Knives need occasional honing to stay at peak sharpness. Let me show you how quickly this can be done."If you sharpen and retry successfully, it rebuilds trust.🛠 𝐋𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐮𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐬:✅ Pre-Test on Real Ingredients – Never assume! Always check before the demo.✅ Keep a Backup Knife – If one fails, switch smoothly.✅ Master Sharpening & Maintenance – Knowing how to fix an issue on the spot adds credibility.✅ Control the Demo Environment – Meat that’s too cold or tough can be a factor.✅ Own the Narrative – If something goes wrong, make it a learning moment rather than an excuse.𝑨𝒅𝒅 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒕𝒉𝒐𝒖𝒈𝒉𝒕𝒔 𝒊𝒏 𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕𝒔Follow for more valuable content 🤝Cheers, 🥂Sachin Sharma…more

Who is better at complex tasks? Ants or humans?Individual humans, of course, outperform ants in their cognitive abilities. But, when we are in the group, ants win. Why?Ants don't have many options - cooperation is their only strategy. In the end, they all are one big family. But humans become short-team-focused selfish species, especially when they can't communicate. And, then, lose... 🤷‍♂️For more details, read this fascinating article -https://lnkd.in/daNucc9vbyWeizmann Institute of Science& Tabea Dreyer.Video byFlorian Palatini----------FollowMichal Ukropecfor more 3D, digitization, and Industry 4.0 trends |hashtag#innovationhashtag#startuphashtag#digitaltwin…more

The smartest employees don’t follow rules.16 Signs of a Highly Intelligent Employee:Most companies reward compliance.They praise the employees who quietly follow orders.But true talent doesn’t thrive on obedience.It thrives on challenging the status quo.Great employees don’t play it safe.↳ They question.↳ They disrupt.↳ They push boundaries.Here’s 5 controversial signs your smartest employees are hiding in plain sight:1️⃣ They skip meetings.↳ Great employees guard their time fiercely, no meetings without clear purpose2️⃣ They ignore most emails.↳ They focus on impact, not inbox zero3️⃣ They challenge authority.↳ They don’t tolerate micromanagement or office politics4️⃣ They protect their energy.↳ They say no often, so they can deliver meaningful work5️⃣ They question everything.↳ Because innovation doesn't happen by blindly following ordersHere's what smart companies do:• Reward boldness, not blind obedience.• Embrace healthy rebellion against bad management.• Value outcomes over outdated rules.Your most powerful employees aren’t easy to manage.They’re the ones rewriting your company's future.Greatness never comes from following rules blindly.It comes from courage to question everything,and change it.Greatness isn't about fitting in.It's about standing out.Image Credit: César Solíshashtag#Jobshashtag#Employeehashtag#Employmenthashtag#Jobculturehashtag#organisationculture…more

🪢 𝑾𝒉𝒚 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝑹𝒊𝒈𝒉𝒕 𝑲𝒏𝒐𝒕 𝑪𝒂𝒏 𝑴𝒆𝒂𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝑫𝒊𝒇𝒇𝒆𝒓𝒆𝒏𝒄𝒆 𝑩𝒆𝒕𝒘𝒆𝒆𝒏 𝑺𝒖𝒄𝒄𝒆𝒔𝒔 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝑭𝒂𝒊𝒍𝒖𝒓𝒆 – 𝑻𝒉𝒆 𝑺𝒄𝒊𝒆𝒏𝒄𝒆 𝑩𝒆𝒉𝒊𝒏𝒅 𝑲𝒏𝒐𝒕𝒔! 🔬🚀🔬 𝐃𝐢𝐝 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐤𝐧𝐨𝐰? 𝐀 𝐩𝐨𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐲 𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐝 𝐤𝐧𝐨𝐭 𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐞 𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞 𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐭𝐡 𝐛𝐲 𝐮𝐩 𝐭𝐨 50%! (𝐉𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐨𝐟 𝐌𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬 𝐒𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞, 2023)From sailing and climbing to rescue operations, choosing the right knot isn't just about strength—𝐢𝐭’𝐬 𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐚𝐝𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐮𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐥.🧠 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐒𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐊𝐧𝐨𝐭𝐬: 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐭𝐡 𝐯𝐬. 𝐅𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧✅ 𝐓𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐛𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 → 𝐀 𝐰𝐞𝐥𝐥-𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐝 𝐤𝐧𝐨𝐭 𝐝𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐛𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐜𝐞 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐥𝐲, 𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐟𝐚𝐢𝐥𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐤.✅ Friction Mechanics → Some knots tighten under pressure, while others allow for quick release.✅ Structural Integrity → High-performance knots prevent rope deformation & breakage.📉 Harvard research found that using the wrong knot under high load increases breakage risk by 65%!🔥 Choosing the Right Knot for the Right Job🟢 Bowline → Strong, non-slip loop (Rescue & Load Securing)🟢 Clove Hitch → Quick & adjustable (Temporary Fixes)🟢 Figure-Eight Knot → Prevents slippage (Climbing & Rigging)🚀 The difference between stability and disaster often comes down to one simple knot.💬 Have you ever faced a situation where the right knot made all the difference? Business mind 🧠Having a sharp business mind means having the ability to identify opportunities, analyze risks, and make strategic decisions that drive growth and success. It involves understanding market trends, consumer behavior, and competition to develop innovative strategies. Adaptability is crucial, as markets are dynamic and constantly evolving. Networking and collaboration skills are also vital for building partnerships and leveraging resources. Financial acumen is essential for managing budgets, forecasting revenue, and optimizing profitability. Effective communication is key for conveying ideas, negotiating deals, and building strong relationships with stakeholders. Embracing technology and staying updated with industry advancements can provide a competitive edge. Continuous learning and self-improvement are fundamental for staying ahead in a fast-paced business environment. Overall, a business mind combines analytical thinking, creativity, leadership, and resilience to navigate challenges and achieve sustainable growth.Follow Zain alihashtag#BusinessMindhashtag#Strategyhashtag#Innovationhashtag#Networkinghashtag#FinancialAcumenhashtag#CommunicationSkillshashtag#Adaptabilityhashtag#Leadershiphashtag#Resiliencehashtag#ContinuousLearning…more

Why Engineering thrives when it comes to disaster?Today Thailand and Myanmar earthquake death toll rises as Bangkok declared disaster area with dozens trapped under skyscraper. The magnitude of 7.7 would make it one of the most powerful quakes to hit the region in recent times; a 6.4-magnitude aftershock hit 12 minutes later.I believe that this "rare" occurance unfold a new opportunity for those in engineering industry. Unpredicted disaster allows engineers who are skilled problem-solvers, to think creatively and practically under pressure.When disasters strike, whether they are natural (earthquakes, floods, hurricanes) or man-made (industrial accidents, infrastructure failures), the immediate need for solutions is critical.  Disasters often demand new ways of thinking. Engineers innovate to create temporary shelters, deploy emergency communication systems, or develop water purification systems when infrastructure is compromised.Furthermore, urgency may also speed up the bureaucracy. Engineering projects often involve working with other professionals—first responders, architects, urban planners, and governments. Engineers bring the technical expertise needed to implement solutions that are feasible for damage assessment and for later restoration.After a disaster, engineers are critical in assessing damage, ensuring safety, and working on repairs or rebuilding efforts.AtMetalextra.com, we support engineer, fabricator and tradesmen with the tools, methods, and mindset to not only respond to, but also recover from disasters, making it a field that thrives when faced with adversity. Feel free to check our solution atwww.Metalextra.com.…more

Teamwork + Leadership = SuccessA powerful combination of teamwork and leadership leads to success in any field. Below is a deep analysis of why teamwork and leadership together create a strong foundation for growth and achievement.1. Leadership Sets the Vision, Teamwork Executes ItA leader provides direction, purpose, and clarity.A strong team works collectively to turn that vision into reality.Without teamwork, a leader’s vision remains just an idea.2. Trust and Collaboration Drive EfficiencyTeams that trust each other achieve goals faster and more effectively.A leader fosters trust by encouraging open communication and respect.When leadership and teamwork align, productivity skyrockets.3. Innovation Thrives in Team-Oriented LeadershipA good leader values diverse ideas from the team.Teamwork promotes brainstorming, creativity, and problem-solving.The best solutions emerge from collaborative efforts, not from a single mind.4. Shared Responsibility Leads to Better Problem-SolvingA leader ensures that every team member has a role to play.When everyone takes ownership, challenges are tackled more effectively.Shared responsibility prevents burnout and builds collective strength.5. Effective Communication is the Key to SuccessA leader must communicate the goals and vision clearly.Teamwork requires transparency and active listening.Strong communication prevents misunderstandings and strengthens unity.6. Adaptability in a Changing EnvironmentA leader guides the team through changes and uncertainties.A strong team adapts quickly, learning from mistakes and evolving.Success comes from resilience and flexibility, both in leadership and teamwork.7. Motivation and Inspiration Keep the Team FocusedA leader inspires and energizes the team during tough times.Team members support and uplift each other.Motivation sustains long-term success, preventing fatigue and disengagement.8. Conflict Resolution Strengthens RelationshipsA leader mediates conflicts and ensures harmony within the team.Teamwork means handling disagreements constructively.Strong teams turn conflicts into opportunities for growth.9. Accountability Ensures Continuous ImprovementA leader holds the team accountable for results.Team members hold each other accountable, promoting reliability.Accountability fosters discipline, commitment, and long-term success.10. Celebrating Success Builds MomentumA good leader acknowledges team efforts and achievements.Team celebrations boost morale and reinforce a culture of appreciation.Recognizing contributions strengthens loyalty and encourages future success.Final ThoughtLeadership and teamwork are not separate but complementary forces. A leader without a team is powerless, and a team without a leader lacks direction. When leadership and teamwork work in harmony, success is inevitable—in business, sports, education, and life itself.Follow us for such knowledge…more

Retractable stadium seating is a marvel of modern engineering, combining space optimization with structural integrity. These seats rely on a telescopic mechanism where interlocking platforms slide out on guided tracks, often powered by synchronized motorized systems. The engineering challenges involve distributing weight evenly across the retractable platforms, ensuring stability during dynamic crowd loads, and minimizing friction for smooth retraction. Advanced materials like reinforced steel, high-grade aluminum, and durable polymers are used to balance strength and lightweight design. Safety mechanisms, including locking pins, stabilizers, and pressure sensors, safeguard against mechanical failure, ensuring a seamless and secure experience for thousands of spectators.…more

THE TECHNOLOGY BEHIND GRAIN TRUCK UNLOADING.1. Automated Unloading System: Modern grain trucks use advanced hydraulic or conveyor-based unloading for efficiency.2. Self-Tilting Mechanism: Some trucks feature hydraulic tilting beds that dump grain without manual effort.3. Auger-Based Unloading: Uses built-in screw conveyors (augers) to move grain out steadily.4. Fast Discharge: Can unload up to 60 tons in minutes, reducing downtime.5. Dust Reduction Technology: Some models include dust suppression systems for cleaner unloading.6. Grain Flow Sensors: AI-driven sensors monitor and regulate grain discharge to prevent waste.7. Common Models: Known as grain hopper trailers, tipper trucks, or live bottom trailers.8. Price Range: Costs vary from $50,000 to $200,000, depending on capacity and features.9. Where to Buy: Available from agricultural machinery dealers and online industrial markets.10. Applications: Used in farming, grain elevators, ports, and processing plants.11. Weather Protection: Features sealed tarps and moisture-resistant coatings.12. Energy Efficiency: Electric-powered systems reduce fuel consumption.13. Remote Operation: Some trucks allow wireless unloading control for safety.14. GPS Integration: Tracks delivery routes and unloading sites in real time.15. Zero Grain Loss Design: Advanced chutes and augers maximize grain recovery.16. Safety Features: Includes anti-rollover stabilization and emergency shut-off systems.17. Impact on Agriculture: Boosts efficiency, reduces labor, and speeds up grain logistics.18. Modular Upgrades: Can be fitted with higher-capacity augers or conveyor belts.19. Eco-Friendly Design: Many manufacturers focus on low-emission engines.20. Future Innovations: AI-driven automation and fully electric grain trucks are under development.…more
